name: Post-apocalyptic Free Throw
description:
In a world without basketballs or baskets, one man or woman (whatever you are) rebels against the stereotypical zombie apocalypse by throwing cinder blocks into steel barrels...

Created as part of the "Make VR Games in Unity with C#" course on Udemy. This is a protoype intended for building to the GearVR.

All assets are either from OpenGameArt.org under the Public Domain license, free assets from the Unity Asset Store, or created by me.
